data.script:
<script>
    import {Box, Grid} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Grid.Container
    class="grid-item-span"
    points={["4", "mobile:2"]}
    spacing="medium"
>
    <Box palette="alert" />
    <Grid.Item
        span_x={["2", "mobile:1"]}
        span_y={["1", "mobile:2"]}
    >
        <Box palette="affirmative" />
    </Grid.Item>
    <Box palette="negative" />

    <Box palette="affirmative" />
    <Box palette="negative" />
    <Box palette="alert" />

    <Box palette="alert" />
    <Box palette="affirmative" />
    <Box palette="negative" />
</Grid.Container>

<style>
    :global(.grid-item-span > *) {
        min-height: 3rem;
    }
</style>
data.title: Grid Item Span
